resources.string: Idea is that make a chrome extension such that it overrides a default New Tab of chrome. And retrieves facebook birthday and pictures using graph API. next we can also use various e-commerce sites to get gifts recommendation for that birthday boy/girl using various parameters like age etc.

I am software engineer and also member of Google Women Techmaker program. I contribute to open source projects related to Java, Javascript and python. Recently I also contributed to Hackerearth\'s chrome extension, which will be online soon. I like watching movies specially the black and white ones.
